criteria: Analysis of Word Relationships and Nuances
descriptions: No attempt to identify or interpret figurative language.
Identifies figurative language, but interpretation is missing or inaccurate.
Basic interpretation of figurative language with limited understanding of its role in the text.
Adequate interpretation of figurative language and some analysis of its role in the text.
Clear and accurate interpretation of figurative language with good analysis of its role in the text.
Insightful and nuanced interpretation of figurative language with thorough analysis of its role and impact on the text.
No attempt to analyze word relationships or nuances in word meanings.
Identifies word relationships but fails to analyze nuances in meaning.
Basic analysis of word relationships with limited understanding of nuances in word meanings.
Adequate analysis of word relationships and some understanding of nuances in word meanings.
Clear analysis of word relationships with good understanding of nuances in word meanings.
Sophisticated analysis of word relationships and insightful understanding of subtle nuances in word meanings and their impact.
